class: center
# `r fontawesome::fa("chalkboard")`
# Today we will cover:

--
### How to perform preliminary visualizations of your data 

--

### You can find the app [here `r fontawesome::fa("external-link-alt")`](https://shaziaruybal.shinyapps.io/covidClassifyR)

---

# `r fa("chart-bar")` Visualization options

--
### - You can take a look at the median fluorescent intensity (MFI) values for each antigen before the conversion to RAU

--
### - You can take a look at the converted relative antibody units (RAU) for each antigen

--
### - If you applied the classification algorithm, you can take a look at the exposure status predictions for each classifier
